marklogic.body: I do like the news format, and I have Always loved Charlie Rose. However, I really DISLIKE all the long commercial breaks that cut back with 10 second Spots only to announce what they're going to talk about when they come back. All stations do this, of coarse, but CBS This Morning is PUNISHING us with this. 2 min. of commercials, 10 seconds of This Morning, 2min commercials, 10 second to tell me of local weather, 2 min commercials, 10 seconds again to tell me what's comming up, 2 min commercials, 5 min Spot for news, 2 min commercials . . . . You get the idea. All the commercials are pushing back to NBC and ABC.
